item.title: Jennifer Lawrence, Robert Pattinson Lose Their Cool in Lynne Ramsay’s ‘Die My Love’ Trailer
item.description: Martin Scorsese produced the psychological drama that hits theaters this fall following its Cannes premiere.

item.title: Daniel Day-Lewis, Richard Linklater and Yorgos Lanthimos Set for Talks at BFI London Film Festival
item.description: Celebrated filmmakers Jafar Panahi, Lynne Ramsay and Chloé Zhao will also join for sessions at this year’s edition of Screen Talks in the British capital.
